Detailed Description

The header file of the conversion source file.

HexWatershed, a hydrologic routing model based on the hexagon mesh framework. Copyright (C) <2002> <Chang liao>=""> Developer can be contacted by chang.nosp@m..lia.nosp@m.o@pnn.nosp@m.l.go.nosp@m.v This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.
